name: Cloud Man Power
description:
Hello!

I ended up taking the "Only One Day" suggestion a bit literally, and made this game in a little under a day, after my first idea went down in flames  : P

You play as Cloud Man! He flies around in his spaceship, trying to cover the world in clouds. Trouble is, he's allergic to clouds! So avoid them!!!

The more clouds you make, the higher your score in the end!
